about_the_game:
Brief history of the game.
Foglight is the first Unreal Engine game from DangerousBob. If you are visiting this store page you are one of the few to have discovered this little horror game that helped build the foundation for DangerousBob Studio LLC.



Foglight is a single player horror game set around a pursuer, Farberto, that pushes the player to fight for their life. All the while you play, Farberto is learning and getting stronger.
You play as a new Lighthouse Keeper, known as a Wickie, that finds out they are not alone on the night's watch. Open world, the game has multiple endings depending on how you play. Best of luck!

Features:

An AI that does not "Cheat"
Unlike in other horror games, this AI plays by the same rules as you. The AI gets harder as time goes on, and reacts to your actions.


Free Roam
The game is set on an open Island, that you are free to explore. Save spots are rare, as the game was intended to be very challenging.

Survival Horror
You will be faced with a Foe that will never stop coming after you. Never. The AI is on a bell curve that will make it try harder as time goes on. Jump scares naturally happen, and you have to stay alert at all times.


Challenging Puzzles
The Island is packed full of secrets and puzzles for you to explore. Take note that these puzzles are not for the faint of heart, and can be difficult even to seasoned horror game players.

Replay Value
As you roam the island, you will set into motion one of several endings that vary widely from the other. Players are encouraged to post which playthrough they got first and play again to get a new one.


Story and Atmosphere
The game is packed full of lore, notes and clues, for the player to explore and read up on. Turn the lights off, pull your chair up, and be ready to get scared!

Note: Youtubers are welcome to make videos or broadcast of this game. Please link to the Steam store in the description.

Players are encouraged to wear headphones.
Sound is not only a big part of the scare factor, it is important for the gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game that features jump scares and some mild scary images. There is no heavy drug use or Sexual Content. This game might be unsuitably for children under 13.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel core i7-9700k or AMD 3700x or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 ti or AMD Radeon 5700 XT or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Survive high risk gameplay as you are pursued by a terrifying monstrosity throughout a perilous open environment. You work to uncover secrets and escape the growing nightmare threatening your life!
